mapper.insert: INSERT INTO leave_request (approval_doc_id, user_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date, days, reason, created_at) VALUES (#{docId}, #{userId}, #{leaveType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{days}, #{reason}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id FROM user u JOIN ranks r ON r.rank_id = u.rank_id WHERE u.dept_id = #{deptId} AND r.rank_level >= 4 ORDER BY r.rank_level ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_line ( approval_doc_id, approver_id, order_num, status, approved_at, comment ) VALUES ( #{docId}, #{approverId}, #{orderNum}, 'APPROVED', #{approvedAt}, null )
